thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com
thread.title: R. Cooke

author: R. Cooke
title: R. Cooke
text:
I need to send funds regularly to the UK, from Australia.
I started doing this through my own bank via International Transactions- no problem - except that what I wanted to send and what eventually arrived did not equate to the going international exchange rate. Charges seemed very high , from the banks in both countries.
OFX claimed to give a better deal - a better exchange rate and little ( or NO ) transaction fee!. I thought I would give it a go. Much better deal. Excellent communication without fuss - the whole process just as stated.
I save hundreds of dollars each month. Great decision! Thanks OFX!!
